title: rustc error in fixed crate

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code This compilation error occurred while compiling crate 'fixed' v1.23.1. This is a dependency for a crate I would like to use, 'sgp40' which is an implementation of 'embedded-hal'. I am developing the program to run on an Arduino Uno. Neither of these crates are used in the code as it was compiled, but nonetheless see the code below. ``` #![no_std] #![no_main] use core::panic::PanicInfo; #[panic_handler] fn panic(_info: &PanicInfo) -> ! { loop {} } #[arduino_hal::entry] fn main() -> ! { let dp = arduino_hal::Peripherals::take().unwrap(); let pins = arduino_hal::pins!(dp); let mut serial = arduino_hal::default_serial!(dp, pins, 57600); /* * For examples (and inspiration), head to * * https://github.com/Rahix/avr-hal/tree/main/examples * * NOTE: Not all examples were ported to all boards! There is a good chance though, that code * for a different board can be adapted for yours. The Arduino Uno currently has the most * examples available. */ let mut led = pins.d13.into_output(); loop { ufmt::uwriteln!(&mut serial, "Hello from Arduino!\r").void_unwrap(); led.toggle(); arduino_hal::delay_ms(1000); } } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.64.0-nightly (6dba4ed21 2022-07-09) binary: rustc commit-hash: 6dba4ed215e7a60f0a2a19c04f3f73691f89c509 commit-date: 2022-07-09 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.64.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.6 ``` ### Error output There is no error output beyond the backtrace below.
Backtrace

std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::hb53aac3d336d1fad at /rustc/6dba4ed215e7a60f0a2a19c04f3f73691f89c509/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 1: 0x7fec14ca1d10 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::h2b89c60e39223848 at /rustc/6dba4ed215e7a60f0a2a19c04f3f73691f89c509/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: 0x7fec14ca1d10 -
